description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 6M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 3M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 3M.
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 
In the absence of accurate dimensions confirming the eaves height and maximum height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the proposal would fail to provide sufficient information to demonstrate the proposal to complies with criteria outlined in A.4 in particular A.4(2)(a)(ii) and A.4(2)(a)(iii) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The proposed external materials are not considered to be similar to the existing dwelling materials, as such the scheme would fail to comply with condition A.3(a) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 3 - INFORMATIVE: This prior approval application pertains only to the single storey rear extension. Any other changes shown on drawings such as to the chimney or front paving have not been assessed.
